title: Core Banking Session Management Defect
root_cause: Connection pool exhaustion under low-bandwidth conditions causes session timeout on authentication service
workaround: Increase connection pool timeout from 30s to 120s in app config

title: Mobile Push Notification Throughput
root_cause: Message queue saturation during peak load causing notification delays exceeding SLA
workaround: Scale notification worker instances during peak hours

title: Payments Latency Under Peak Load
root_cause: Database index fragmentation causing query degradation during peak trading window
workaround: Scheduled index rebuild during maintenance window
